channel.title: Help plz

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @kill_boy_98 kill boy 98
item.description:
@kill_boy_98 wrote:

hi everyone so plz could someone help so i want the interface whith the red box to show in the one whith the blue box

The pic http://i1337.photobucket.com/albums/o670/Christian_Mark_Zack_Harrison/help-3.png

This is the code i got for the interface just in case you need it and i think it will have something to do whith clickingbuttons but not sure

[code]public static void staffTab(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(24999);
int index = 0;
addText(28024, “Staff List”, 0xff9933, true, true, -1, TDA, 1);
